title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.6 - Operation of vehicles on landing area restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1274.6 - Operation of vehicles on landing area restricted

State Regulations

All vehicles operating on the public landing area shall
obtain clearance from the control tower before entry thereon. Between the hours
of sunrise and sunset, such vehicles shall have a radio receiver in operation, or shall be painted bright yellow, or display a checkered flag, not less than
three feet square, of international orange and white, the checks being at least
one foot on each side; between the hours of sunset and sunrise, such vehicles
shall have a radio receiver in operation or an overhead red light shall be
displayed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1274.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
